long_prompt: Four sleek wooden boats, two with colorful sails, are moored in a calm marina, while a single steaming bowl of fragrant curry rests on a nearby picnic table.

Four colorful boats float gently on a serene lake, with a steaming curry simmering on a wooden dock nearby, creating a cozy lakeside scene.
